channel.title: Adjusting to the many new updates!
channel.description:
I used to play RS a lot when I was younger, but I lost my desire to play it about two years ago. I got on a few days ago to try a few things that I've never done before, like Farming and other types of non-combat skills, and I've actually started to enjoy the game again. I've noticed a lot of different changes, both good and bad, but it shouldn't be too hard for me to adapt to them. I was wondering if anyone that played RS wanted to add me and chat about the game or something, because right I'm casting high alchemy so I can get my Magic level to 85 for Ganodermic.
To help keep this thread on topic to the board's description, post your favorite updates from this past year. I'd have to say mine is the daily challenge system.

item.title: Adjusting to the many new updates!
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

They can attempt to fix it all they want, but it will still be terrible.

Read full topic
item.source: Adjusting to the many new updates!

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

the babymaking skill :hurr:

but no seriously, I sort of like how Jagex ( while failing! ) is attempting to fix the economy. I.E. runespan ( not as many rc botters now )

item.title: Adjusting to the many new updates!
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

i’ll add you i need a new rs buddy anyways my last one scammed me for 50m lol, and my favorite recent update has to be the gwd rework and the dungeon’s rework, looks outstanding. anyways pm me your username i keep my private chat on friend’s because i dont like being spammed by the gold farmer ad’s
